text: Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Keiten'notami yo, anata gataga watashi-tachi o hinan suru no wa, tada watashi-tachi ga arrā o shinji, mata watashi-tachi ni kudasa reta mono (kuruān), mata izen ni kudasa reta mono (rippō, fukuin) o shinjiru tamedearu no ka, tada anata gata no ōku ga arrā no okite ni somuku-sha-tachidearu tamede wanai ka
